name: My Demon Friends
summary: Zhou Li has been able to see demons since he was young, but it wasn’t until the end of his senior year in high school that he actually came into contact with one.“You can see me, right?”“You must be able to see me!”“You were looking at me just now!” The barefoot youth kept pace with Zhou Li.“Stop pretending, I've figured you out!”“Hey! You're still pretending?”
author: Golden Jasmine Flower
